description:
Takemichi heads to his first Toman meeting wearing his jacket and is surprised to see the vice commander of Valhalla, Hanma, and Chifuyu standing next to Mikey. Not only that, but he finds out that it was Kisaki Tetta who arranged all of this. Takemichi falls into despair when he realizes he wasn`t able to change the future again despite Baji sacrificing his own life to protect Toman. And then, Chifuyu says...
Source: crunchyroll
